SEARCH
Package tools

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
tools.Constants
public class Constants extends Object
This class provides a central location for managing all constants used across the Ticket Management System. It includes constants for input handling, error checking parameters, and specific application-wide values.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    BOOKING_INVALID_NUM
    The minimum number of segments expected in a valid booking data line, used to validate file data.
    static final int
    BOOKING_TOTAL_NUM
    The index in the booking data array that holds the total number of tickets for a booking.
    static final int
    CONCERT_BOOKED
    Represents a booked seat in the seating layout.
    static final String
    CONCERT_EXIT
    A constant used to represent the command to exit from a concert context within the application.
    static final int
    CONCERT_INVALID_NUM
    The minimum number of segments expected in a valid concert data line, used to validate file data.
    static final Scanner
    INPUT_SCANNER
    Scanner object for handling all user input throughout the application.
    static final int
    LENGTH_OF_A_TICKET
    The length of data representing a single ticket in the booking file, used for parsing ticket information.
    static final int
    USER_EXIST
    The exact number of arguments expected when an existing user is initializing in customer mode.
    static final String
    USER_EXIT
    A constant used to represent the command to exit from any menu or the application.
    static final int
    USER_INVALID_FILE
    The minimum number of segments expected in a valid user data line, used to validate file data.
    static final int
    USER_INVALID_NUM
    The minimum number of arguments required for admin mode to initialize correctly.
    static final int
    USER_NEW
    The exact number of arguments expected when initializing a new customer account.
